description: ZipExec is a Proof-of-Concept (POC) tool to wrap binary-based tools into a password-protected zip file. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious ZipExec Execution
query: (process.command_line:*.zip* AND ((process.command_line:*\/generic\:Microsoft_Windows_Shell_ZipFolder\:filename\=* AND process.command_line:*\/pass\:* AND process.command_line:*\/user\:*) OR (process.command_line:*\/delete* AND process.command_line:*Microsoft_Windows_Shell_ZipFolder\:filename\=*)))
